answers.answer: Feeling depressed after a break up is normal. Feeling suicidal is of concern. I would speak to a psychiatrist and of course talk therapist as well. After some time of seperation then you can seek other relationships. Its not pleasent but its unfortunately part of life. Your feelings are understandable and I sympathize but they are only hurting you as well. As for depression it is of course treatable and any event like this will make it worse. Speak to someone before things get out of hand.

I definitely have gone through this, 9 months ago my boyfriend left me after telling me he wanted a family for so long with me. I would love to talk or just listen if you want, it helps me also to hear other people and you are not alone.
Even situational depression brought on by loss of some kind sometimes needs a little extra attention. If you have suicidal thoughts tho, you need to see an expert.
